name: Controller Twister
description:
‘Controller Twister’ is a chaotic coop game for three players, inspired by 'Overcooked', 'FTL' and the classic kids game 'Twister'.

Your goal is to survive on a space ship full of constantly overheating terminals for five minutes. Each terminal desires certain button inputs, so take care not to get your fingers entangled with your fellow robots.

Once three terminals exploded, you lose. When five minutes have passed, you reach your destination and win the game. And then you try again in order to beat the highscore or finally become MVP this time.

This game was made by these three programmers who have no clue how to do proper 2D art:

  • Mirko Skroch
  • Norman Henges
  • Friedemann Spitzner
